summary:
A sweet, but deadly nord girl from Whiterun, to recruit her look in the description for her location.
Compatible with CBBE, UNP and other body mods and retextures
descriptionHtml:
Annael v1.1f nord custom NPC follower - works with all body mods

This is the final version of Annael from me, i will no longer upload any updates or new look options, and i am no longer taking requests for optional looks.

I am sorry to inform, but i have been away from Skyrim since september 2012 and i am no longer providing support for my mods.
If you read the description and follow all requirements there should not be any problems at all.
Thank you for understanding and for all endorsements.

I am giving up this mod and editing access to zzjay to take over as she is the co-creator and author of the looks.

Change log
Version 1.1
-Removed the need for a coin, now she is players ally from start
-cleaned up the files from the double selections bug and other left over IDs and stuff
Make sure you dismiss her and save in another cell before updating

<!!!Choose only one of the main files!!!>

This is the 8th one from my Ehm.. cheap girls collection ;)

She is actually created thanks to zzjay who supplied me with all slider details and screenshots so i could
create an NPC from his save game character, means the model itself is his.
---------------------------------
PLEASE READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION
---------------------------------

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8170/7899915722_f150fe5c76.jpg[/img]

this is an auto-level up version she will level up same as player up to 120

She is a Follower and Marriage NPC

<Requires: ApachiiSkyHair pack [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]LINK[/url]
<any retex will work fine

Location:
You\'ll find her in Whiterun, this is her time schedule and places where you can find her:

8am-3pm shopping on the market
3pm-7pm hangs around gildergreen tree
7pm-8am resides inside drunken huntsman

the times may not be always correct so keep an eye out for a girl wearing farm clothes 4 (same as Ysolda).


description and class:
this is not an edited vanilla NPC this is an EXTRA one and she is essential (cannot die)
Follower NPC addon, standalone, marriable, favor related (a coin for a beggar)
She is a combat assassin bow and one-handed preferred, but she can dual wield, if the dual wield doesn\'t work use this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13571 (dual wield for followers)
Weight: 45

only spells she has is healing
Preferable armor: light

No need for any body/face mods
but to make her look like on the screenshots you would need:

Coverwomen from - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563

Covereyes from - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869

CBBE v3 from - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

KillerKeosSkimpy Armor Set - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Triss armor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708

All of my followers work with UFO, Extensible Follower Framework and Convenient Horses mods

Highly suggested follower behaviour mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23796]Lively Followers by PrinceShroob[/url] (make your follower behave like Serana)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
She works with all body,hair and face mods and is editable in NPC editor!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

for advanced users:
if you like different hair,face,body any hair, face or body mod will do. IF you are not happy with her look,
just download and install the NPC editor and change her to your likings

please report bugs if you find some, but it should work perfectly, i tested it myself.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-installation: unpack and drop the esp and bsa files in skyrim/data folder

-uninstallation: delete the Annael.esp and .bsa


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
conflicts: none known

bugs: 
-using custom hairs on NPCs or adding them to NPCs using NPC editor will cause double IDs means multiple selections in race menu of a particular hair type you used.
-her sandbox is complex so before contacting me that you cannot find her, open the console
and write - help annael 0 and that should then show her name and id, if not it means the game doesn\'t load her at all
so check your game launcher and that you have installed her properly
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have fun and don\'t forget to endorse if you like it
I can do a different look on request


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My follower mods: just click on a picture for the link

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14219][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/14219-1-1344467034.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15095][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/15095-1-1334437040.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16179][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/16179-1-1335796393.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21544][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/21544-1-1345045679.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23904][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23904-1-1347223279.jpg[/img][/url]

Sylvia\'s tattoo set moders resource:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23362][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23362-1-1346364730.jpg[/img][/url]

Easy NPC creation tutorial:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23972][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23972-1-1347330673.jpg[/img][/url]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to zzjay for his gorgeous screenshot of her that he allowed me to use as a primary for this mod
and for a wonderful model to work with without which, this NPC would not come to life

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and (not really) for Creation Kit

Biggest Thanks goes to all the patient moders out there who delivered all the great mods.


BravoOskar 13/4/2012
author: BravoOskar and zzjay
